snippet: Professional soccer is reaching new heights of popularity in the United States, and fans are trying to incorporate foreign traditions without seeming pretentious.
abstract: Professional soccer in America is reaching new heights of popularity on the eve of 2014 World Cup in Brazil; America’s soccer fans have a fighting chance of turning this great world pursuit into an American pastime, and are trying to figure some potentially happy way of incorporating European traditions into a new American fan style.
lead_paragraph: Professional soccer is reaching new heights of popularity in the United States, and fans are trying to incorporate foreign traditions without seeming pretentious.

headline.main: As World Cup Nears, American ‘Football’ Fans Adapt Foreign Traditions

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
